籤詩版本二:
Munondo unopenya zvakajeka kana uchibuda mubhokisi, asi haukweve guruva mubhokisi.
Iye zvino ndine munhu anokudzwa, ane simba uye ane simba, uye vanhu vose vanondiyemura
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra bakatwa rinobuda mubhokisi.
Zvose zvine simba uye zvine simba.
解曰: Munondo unobuda mubhokisi. Kupenya kwezviuru zvemamaira. Nhungamiro yakanaka. Zvinhu zvose zvakanaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong inoponesa Adou
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Zhao Yun, zita rekuremekedza Zilong, aive chizvarwa cheChangshan. Pakutanga, aivimba naYuan Shao, ndokuzotevera Liu (Bei), ishe wekutanga weWestern Shu.
Panguva iyoyo, Cao Cao aida kuenda kumaodzanyemba kweRwizi rwaYangtze.Akatanga kurwisa aimbova ishe Liu Bei muXinye (zita renzvimbo), uye aimbova ishe akatizira kuFancheng. Akakundwa zvakare muDangyang uye nhengo dzemhuri yake dzakaparadzaniswa. Zhao Yun akasangana naMai Wei (Mai Liu Bei) pasi pemadziro evhu.
Mudzimai uyu akapa mwanakomana wake Adou (mwanakomana waLiu Bei, Liu Chan) kuna Zhao Yun. Zhao Yun akapa bhiza kumukadzi wacho, asi mukadzi wacho akaramba kurigamuchira ndokuzvikanda mutsime achibva afa.
Mushure mekunge Zhao Yun achema nekuviga mukadzi wake, akambundira Adou ndokurwa nzira yake yekubuda mukukomba.
聖意: Namatira rombo rakanaka mumba mako nemumba mako, namatira kuwana mari, rombo rakanaka mukutengeserana, wanano yakanaka, vakadzi vanofamba netsoka, Chitian silkworms, kutanga kukuvara kwezvipfuyo zvitanhatu, vanhu vakashaika, kumatare edzimhosva, kutama, kurasikirwa pfuma, zvirwere zvekumaodzanyemba, kudzoka. zvishuwo zvekare, rombo rakanaka kumakomo nemakuva
